AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_FWD_ACTION_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents all the attributes of a trap forward action

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_SNOOP_ACTION_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the snoop command that beeing preformed per trap

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_MIRROR_ACTION_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table represents the mirror command being performed per trap

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_STAT_SAMPLE_ACTION_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the stat sampling command that beeing preformed per trap

AppDB.Name: TRAP_FWD_SNP_STRENGTH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents Forward and Snoop Strength for predefined trap not mates

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_CODE_SET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents trap code set for predefined traps

AppDB.Name: TRAP_FWD_RCY_CMD_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping from forward recycle command to trap code and strength

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_FWD_STRENGTH_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping from forward recycle command to trap code and strength

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_PROG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table hold the information for the 8 programmable trap profiles.

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_SAME_INTERFACE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This is a mapping for Same Interface to Trap-Action-Profile and ports compare

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_INVALID_DEST
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configuration of Destination and FHEI staming in case of invalid destination

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_MEM_SOFT_ERR
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configuration of Destination and FHEI staming in case of memory soft error

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_ETHERNET_LAYER_PROTOCOL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Layer-Protocol (5b) to ethernet trap action index (3b)

AppDB.Name: TRAP_INGRESS_LAST_RESOLVED
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table represents trap/snoop code and strengths of last packet
